Title: Pandaren Prisoners
Description:
Look, I know the Horde needs recruits, and there's just not enough of us here right now to make a fighting presence of this town.

But I know that the yaungol over at Fire Camp Ordo, to the west, have taken many of my people as prisoners. And I also know that if you would be willing to rescue them from their captivity, they'd more than likely be willing to join the Horde.

What do you say, $n?
